channel.title: meals on AOE OpenSource

item.title: üçΩ Savory Meals
item.description: Meals, as the name suggests, is an application to manage meals. It was developed at AOE to manage employee lunch meals. What initially started as a small tool has now grown in to a mature and enterprise ready application, and it’s still growing. It’s been open source ever since, and we love to share it.
